sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_hocsa_san.SLX_hco_entregable</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SLX_hco_entregable</name><script><![CDATA[var SLX_hco_entregable = Class.create();
SLX_hco_entregable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	obtenerHCO: function(entregable)
	{
	
		var gr= new GlideRecord('x_hocsa_san_nen');
		var nen = this.getParameter('sysparm_nen');
		gr.addQuery("sys_id",nen);
		gr.query();
	
		if(gr.next()){
		return gr.u_slx_hco;
		}
		}, 

    type: 'SLX_hco_entregable'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bs</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-24 16:13:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>84e35a0e1bbe5010d8d6b887cc4bcbb8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX_hco_entregable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="san" source="x_hocsa_san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="san">b3538a711ba598108802dac2cd4bcb8e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_84e35a0e1bbe5010d8d6b887cc4bcbb8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bs</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-24 16:13:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
